followMeHome.title: Follow Me Home
followMeHome.description: A personal safety feature for when you're walking alone or in an unfamiliar area. Set up emergency contacts, choose a security level, and let your loved ones know you're safe.

contacts.title: Emergency Contacts

upload.title: Upload from Contacts
upload.privacy: Only contact information will be stored. We respect your privacy.

contacts.uploadDescription: Quickly add emergency contacts by importing from your phone's contact list.

contacts.title: Emergency Contacts
contacts.description: These contacts will be notified about your trip status. They must accept a handshake to participate.

low.label: Low
low.description: Quick errands, daily commute. Periodic updates.

medium.label: Medium
medium.description: Night walk, unfamiliar area. More frequent updates.

high.label: High
high.description: Feeling unsafe, risky area. Live tracking and alerts.

eta.title: Estimated Arrival Time (ETA)
eta.description: Your contacts will be alerted if you don't check in by this time.

active.title: Trip in Progress
active.mapPlaceholder: Live map view will be shown here

ended.description: You have safely completed your trip. Your contacts have been notified.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth LE
bluetooth.description: Configure Bluetooth Low Energy settings for peer-to-peer communication in offline scenarios.

peerSync.title: Peer Synchronization
peerSync.description: Enable direct device-to-device communication for location sharing and emergency alerts.

range.title: Communication Range
range.description: Adjust Bluetooth transmission power for optimal range and battery life.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi Direct
wifi.description: Set up Wi-Fi Direct for high-speed peer-to-peer networking when available.

direct.title: Wi-Fi Direct
direct.description: Enable Wi-Fi Direct for faster data transfer and extended range communication.

opportunistic.title: Opportunistic Forwarding
opportunistic.description: Allow your device to relay messages through nearby devices when direct connection isn't available.

mesh.title: Mesh Network
mesh.description: Configure mesh networking for extended coverage in rural areas and device-dense environments.

routing.title: Routing Mode
routing.description: Choose how messages are routed through the mesh network.

community.title: Community Mesh
community.description: Join or create a community mesh network for enhanced coverage in your area.

battery.title: Battery Optimization
battery.description: Configure power-saving features to extend battery life during offline operation.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Sampling
adaptive.description: Automatically adjust location update frequency based on movement and battery level.

dutyCycling.title: Duty Cycling
dutyCycling.description: Control how often the device wakes up to check for network activity.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Configure privacy settings and data handling for offline networking.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All offline communications are encrypted using military-grade encryption.

consent.title: Relay Consent
consent.description: Control whether your device can be used to relay messages for other users.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Set how long offline network data is stored on your device.
